about_the_game:
The Sleeper's Sketchbook collects some of the many sketches Guillaume Singelin did for the characters of Citizen Sleeper 2. We have avoided major spoilers and returning characters from Citizen Sleeper, as we'd like you to discover them in the game itself.

We hope you enjoy this 45 page companion to Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector.

To access this digital art book:

  • Right click Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector in your Steam Library

  • Select Manage

  • Select Browse Local Files

  • Open Sleepers Sketchbook - Jump Over the Age.pdf
detailed_description:
The Sleeper's Sketchbook collects some of the many sketches Guillaume Singelin did for the characters of Citizen Sleeper 2. We have avoided major spoilers and returning characters from Citizen Sleeper, as we'd like you to discover them in the game itself.

We hope you enjoy this 45 page companion to Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector.

To access this digital art book:

  • Right click Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector in your Steam Library

  • Select Manage
